alert.note: Alert for Assumption; Lower Terrebonne; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 2:40PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Terrebonne, northwestern Lafourche and southeastern Assumption Parishes through 315 PM CDT... At 240 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Labadieville, or 9 miles east of Stephensville, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Supreme, Labadieville and Schriever. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; Lower Terrebonne; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne
